meat.name: Chicken
meat.description: Farm-raised chicken with lean protein and rich flavor. A versatile choice for a wide range of dishes, from everyday meals to gourmet recipes.

breast.label: Chicken Breast
breast.description: Boneless, skinless white meat that is lean, tender, and ideal for grilling, baking, or slicing into salads.

drumstick.label: Chicken Drumstick
drumstick.description: Juicy dark meat with bold flavor, perfect for frying, roasting, or BBQ. A family favorite for its taste and ease of cooking.

wing.label: Chicken Wing
wing.description: Crispy and flavorful, these wings are perfect for deep frying, air frying, or coating in your favorite sauces.

thigh.label: Chicken Thigh
thigh.description: Rich and tender dark meat that stays moist during cooking. Great for curries, stews, or grilling with marinades.

whole.label: Whole Chicken
whole.description: A full bird ideal for roasting, meal prepping, or slow cooking. Includes all parts with skin and bones for maximum flavor.

meat.name: Beef
meat.description: Premium-grade beef sourced from grass-fed cattle. Known for its rich flavor, high protein, and versatility in both slow-cooked and grilled recipes.

ribeye.label: Beef Ribeye Steak
ribeye.description: A well-marbled, tender cut perfect for grilling or pan-searing. Rich in flavor and juiciness.

brisket.label: Beef Brisket
brisket.description: A flavorful, tougher cut ideal for smoking, braising, or slow-cooking to tender perfection.

ground.label: Ground Beef
ground.description: Finely ground beef with balanced fat content. Excellent for burgers, tacos, and meat sauces.

tenderloin.label: Beef Tenderloin
tenderloin.description: The most tender beef cut, often used for filet mignon. Mild flavor and soft texture.

meat.name: Pork
meat.description: Fresh pork sourced from ethically raised pigs. Ideal for a variety of cooking styles, offering both tender and richly flavored cuts.

loin.label: Pork Loin
loin.description: A lean and tender cut, great for roasting, grilling, or slicing into chops.

belly.label: Pork Belly
belly.description: Rich and fatty, often used for bacon or slow-roasting until crisp and tender.

ribs.label: Pork Ribs
ribs.description: Flavorful and meaty, perfect for BBQ or oven-baking with dry rubs or marinades.

ham.label: Pork Ham
ham.description: Classic cut from the hind leg, suitable for roasting or slicing for sandwiches.

meat.name: Lamb
meat.description: Tender and flavorful lamb, pasture-raised and ideal for both traditional and modern cuisine. Known for its unique taste and succulent texture.

leg.label: Lamb Leg
leg.description: A classic roast cut, bone-in or boneless. Juicy and tender when slow-cooked or oven-roasted.

chop.label: Lamb Chop
chop.description: Tender cuts from the rib or loin, ideal for quick grilling or pan-searing with herbs.

rack.label: Rack of Lamb
rack.description: Elegant and tender rib section, often roasted whole or sliced into individual chops.

meat.name: Duck
meat.description: Rich and flavorful duck meat, known for its dark color and crisp skin. Excellent for gourmet dishes, roasts, or confit.

whole.label: Whole Duck
whole.description: A full duck, ideal for roasting whole or breaking down into parts. Skin-on for crispy texture and maximum flavor.

breast.label: Duck Breast
breast.description: Lean and tender with a rich, meaty flavor. Best seared skin-side down for crispy texture and medium-rare center.

leg.label: Duck Leg (Confit Cut)
leg.description: Commonly used in duck confit. Slow-cooked until tender, with skin that crisps beautifully when pan-fried.

wing.label: Duck Wing
wing.description: Flavor-packed wings great for slow roasting or use in rich stocks and broths.

vegetable.name: Tomato
vegetable.description: Fresh, ripe tomatoes with vibrant color and juicy texture. Ideal for salads, sauces, cooking, or slicing raw. Naturally rich in vitamins A and C.

vegetable.name: Potato
vegetable.description: Versatile and hearty, potatoes are a staple in kitchens worldwide. Ideal for baking, mashing, roasting, or frying. Rich in carbohydrates and a good source of potassium.

vegetable.name: Cabbage
vegetable.description: Crisp, green cabbage with a mild, slightly sweet flavor. A versatile vegetable for slaws, stir-fries, soups, or even as a wrap. High in fiber and vitamin C.

vegetable.name: Carrot
vegetable.description: Sweet, crunchy carrots rich in beta-carotene, fiber, and vitamins. Ideal for snacking, salads, soups, or roasting. A versatile vegetable for both raw and cooked dishes.

vegetable.name: Onion
vegetable.description: A kitchen essential with a strong, savory flavor. Onions are perfect for sautéing, adding to soups, stews, and salads, or caramelizing for depth of flavor. A good source of antioxidants and vitamin C.

vegetable.name: Mushroom
vegetable.description: Fresh, earthy mushrooms with a delicate flavor and meaty texture. Ideal for sautés, soups, salads, or pizza toppings. A good source of antioxidants, vitamins, and minerals.

vegetable.name: Pumpkin
vegetable.description: Sweet and earthy pumpkin, perfect for soups, pies, curries, or roasting. Rich in vitamins A and C, fiber, and antioxidants, making it both nutritious and versatile.

vegetable.name: Broccoli
vegetable.description: Crisp and vibrant green broccoli, packed with vitamins, fiber, and antioxidants. Ideal for steaming, roasting, or adding to salads and stir-fries. A healthy addition to any meal.

fruit.name: Apple
fruit.description: Crisp, juicy apples with a sweet-tart flavor. Perfect for snacking, baking, or adding to salads. Rich in fiber and vitamin C, making it a healthy and versatile fruit.

fruit.name: Banana
fruit.description: Sweet and creamy bananas, perfect for snacking or adding to smoothies, oatmeal, or baked goods. A great source of potassium and energy for a healthy diet.

fruit.name: Strawberry
fruit.description: Sweet, juicy strawberries, perfect for desserts, smoothies, or snacking. Rich in antioxidants and vitamin C, these berries are a fresh and healthy treat.

fruit.name: Grape
fruit.description: Fresh, sweet grapes, perfect for snacking or adding to salads and desserts. Packed with antioxidants and vitamin K, these bite-sized fruits are a healthy and delicious choice.

fruit.name: Orange
fruit.description: Fresh, juicy oranges with a tangy sweetness, perfect for juicing, snacking, or adding to salads. A great source of vitamin C and antioxidants, promoting a healthy immune system.

fruit.name: Mango
fruit.description: Ripe and juicy mangoes with a rich, tropical flavor. Perfect for smoothies, salads, salsas, or enjoying fresh. Packed with vitamins A and C, making it a sweet and nutritious treat.

fruit.name: Pineapple
fruit.description: Sweet and tangy pineapple, perfect for tropical smoothies, fruit salads, or grilling. Packed with vitamin C and bromelain, a natural enzyme that aids digestion. Not for pizza, though!

fruit.name: Cherry
fruit.description: Sweet and tangy cherries, perfect for snacking, baking, or adding to desserts. Rich in antioxidants and vitamin C, cherries are a delicious and healthy treat.

seafood.name: Crab
seafood.description: Fresh, sweet crab with tender meat, perfect for boiling, grilling, or making crab cakes. A delicacy rich in protein and omega-3s, ideal for any seafood lover.

seafood.name: Salmon
seafood.description: Premium-quality salmon known for its rich flavor and vibrant pink color. Perfect for grilling, baking, sashimi, or pan-searing. High in omega-3 fatty acids and protein, making it a nutritious and delicious choice.

seafood.name: Shrimp
seafood.description: Fresh, succulent shrimp ideal for stir-fries, grilling, pasta dishes, or seafood platters. Quick to cook and packed with lean protein, they add a sweet, ocean-fresh taste to any meal.

seafood.name: Squid
seafood.description: Tender and mild in flavor, squid is a favorite for grilling, frying, or stuffing. Popular in dishes like calamari, it's high in protein and cooks quickly for a satisfying seafood experience.

seafood.name: Octopus
seafood.description: Rich and meaty with a slightly sweet taste, octopus is a delicacy enjoyed grilled, braised, or in seafood stews. A lean source of protein that's tender when cooked properly and packed with ocean flavor.

seafood.name: Lobster
seafood.description: Premium wild-caught lobster with rich, buttery flavor and tender texture. A gourmet favorite perfect for boiling, grilling, or steaming. High in protein and ideal for special occasions or seafood feasts.

seafood.name: Oyster
seafood.description: Freshly harvested oysters served raw, grilled, or baked. Known for their briny, ocean-forward flavor and smooth texture. A delicacy rich in zinc and often enjoyed with lemon, sauces, or a touch of spice.

seafood.name: Tuna
seafood.description: Firm, flavorful tuna perfect for grilling, searing, or enjoying raw in sushi and poke. High in protein and omega-3 fatty acids, it's a nutritious and satisfying seafood staple for everyday meals or gourmet dishes.

dairy.name: Milk
dairy.description: Fresh and creamy cow's milk, perfect for drinking, cereal, coffee, or cooking. Rich in calcium, protein, and essential vitamins. A kitchen staple for all ages.

dairy.name: Cheddar Cheese
dairy.description: Aged cheddar cheese with a sharp, tangy flavor and firm texture. Perfect for sandwiches, melting on burgers, or adding richness to pasta and baked dishes. A great source of calcium and protein.

dairy.name: Yogurt
dairy.description: Creamy and probiotic-rich yogurt, ideal for breakfast bowls, smoothies, or snacking. Available in plain or flavored varieties. Supports digestion and overall gut health.

dairy.name: Butter
dairy.description: Creamy, rich butter made from fresh cream, perfect for cooking, baking, or spreading on toast. Adds a silky, indulgent flavor to dishes, and a kitchen staple for many recipes.

sauce.name: Hot Sauce
sauce.description: A fiery blend of chili peppers, vinegar, and spices. Perfect for spicing up tacos, wings, and all your favorite dishes. Adds a bold kick of heat and flavor to your meals.

sauce.name: Soy Sauce
sauce.description: Traditional soy sauce made from fermented soybeans, perfect for stir-fries, marinades, and dipping sauces. Adds a savory umami flavor to dishes and a great addition to Asian cuisine.

sauce.name: Barbecue Sauce
sauce.description: Smoky and tangy barbecue sauce, perfect for grilling, marinating, and as a dip. It adds a rich, sweet, and spicy flavor to meats, vegetables, and sandwiches.

sauce.name: Ketchup
sauce.description: Classic tomato ketchup with a perfect balance of sweet and tangy. Ideal for burgers, fries, and as a condiment for various fast foods.

sauce.name: Mustard
sauce.description: Classic yellow mustard with a tangy and slightly spicy flavor. Perfect for hot dogs, sandwiches, and as a dressing for salads or marinades.

sauce.name: Sour Cream
sauce.description: Creamy and tangy sour cream, perfect for tacos, baked potatoes, or as a base for dips. Adds a smooth texture and mild acidity to dishes.
